charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Sentenced to 312 Months Imprisonment as to Counts 1, 2 &; 4, he is Further Sentenced to 120 Months on Count 3, All Counts Are to Run Concurrently; 36 Months Supervised Release; A Fine of $4,340.71 And A Special Assessment of $ 200.00, Both of Which Have Been Paid in Full. The Defendant Shall Receive Credit For Time Served From August 20, 1990.

Judgment as to Louis Pugliano (11), Count(S) 1, 3, 4S, Defendant Was Found Guilty to Counts 1, 3 And 4 of The Third Superseding Indictment. Defendant is Sentenced to Time Served on Counts 1 And 4; Defendant Has Served The Entire Sentence of 120 Months Previously Imposed on Count 3. Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Total Term of 3 Years on Each Count to Run Concurrently, With Special Conditions. Defendant Shall Pay A Re-Imposed Fine of $10,000.00 And A Special Assessment of $50.00 For Counts 1, 3 And 4, A Total of $150.00.. Signed by Judge Alan H. Nevas on 12/19/06. Amended Judgment - Date of Imposition of Sentence 12/18/06. in All Other Respects The Origianl Judgment Remains The Same.
